item.title: How to create a virtual environment in python3?
item.description: What is virtual environment? A virtual environment is the environment which differs from the actual installed python and other system environments, which means that you can individually install libraries for the python programs and project in the virtual env and not disturbing the actual system environment. How to create it? Go to the folder where you want to create an env and write python3 -m venv env it will create an folder naming env in the directory Now go to the env folder by typing cd env then locate the activate.

item.title: Mathematics 3 Resources
item.description: Here are some of the resources which might be usefull for solving numerical problems All short notes :- (https://btech-notes.rgpvnotes.in/2019/03/mathematics-iii-bt-401.html) Bisection and Newton Raphson method solver online :-(https://atozmath.com/CONM/Bisection.aspx?q=nr) Newton’s forward,backward interpolation, divide differnce and Lagrange’s Interpolation formula calculator :- There are two choices,Byju’s and Atozmath I like the Atozmath’s one (https://atozmath.com/CONM/NumeInterPola.aspx) Trapazoidal Rule : (https://atozmath.com/CONM/NumeInte.aspx?q=T) Simpson’s 1/3rd and 3/8 Rule :- (https://atozmath.com/CONM/NumeInte.aspx?q=T) Solving Differntial equation using Euler Method :- (https://atozmath.com/CONM/RungeKutta.aspx?q=euler) Runge-Kutta Method :- (https://atozmath.

item.title: My First Post
item.description: Hello World!!! Wait!! Is it mandatory to say Hello World, every time you make a new blog,then certainly yes. Anyways let me start by saying something which probabaly no one will ever be reading on the Internet. Yes I am sure, it requires efforts to read, that’s why very few people read and write (is that so?) Yeap it requires lots and lots of efforts that’s why not writing, lazy me.
